verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Draw me nearer nearer
Nearer blessed Lord
To the cross where thou hast died
Draw me nearer nearer
Nearer blessed Lord
To Thy precious bleeding side

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am Thine O Lord
I have heard Thy voice
And it told of Thy great love for me
But I long to rise in the arms of faith
And be closer drawn to Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Consecrate me now to Thy service Lord
By the pow'r of Thy grace divine
Let my soul look up with a steadfast hope
And my will be lost in Thine

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh the pure delight of a single hour
That beore Thy throne I spend
When I kneel in prayer
and with Thee my God
I commune as friend with friend

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There are depths of love
That I cannot know
Till I cross the narrow sea
There are heights of joy
That I may not reach
Till I rest in peace with Thee
